div.p: The official URL for this implementation guide is:
Examples of CPG computable content representing a congestive heart failure pathway

title.value: Clinical Practice Guidelines Example Implementation Guide - Congestive Heart Failure

publisher.value: HL7 International - Clinical Decision Support WG

name.value: HL7 International - Clinical Decision Support WG

description.value: Examples of CPG computable content representing a congestive heart failure pathway

valueMarkdown.value: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology
Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on the HL7 Extension Pack

description.value: This profile defines how to represent body weight observations in FHIR using a standard LOINC code and UCUM units of measure (in kg).
This profile defines how to represent body weight change observations in FHIR using a CHF code and UCUM units of measure (in kg).

name.value: CHF Body Weight Change Activity Defintion

description.value: Body weight change metric as a feature of a congestive heart failure pathway
Body weight metric as a feature of a congestive heart failure pathway
Documents a procedure as an activity within the context of a computable clinical practice guideline
Request for a cardiology consultation as part of a congestive heart failure pathway
Cardiology consultation as part of a congestive heart failure care pathway
Codes used in the congestive heart failure pathway. Ideally these shouldn't exist, but where I couldn't find an appropriate code in a standard terminology, I defined codes here.
This profile defines how to represent creatinine observations in FHIR using a LOINC code and UCUM units of measure (in mg/dL).
Daily management strategy as part of a care pathway for patients with admitting diagnosis of congestive heart failure
This profile defines how to represent eGFR in FHIR using a CHF code and UCUM units of measure (in mol/mm/m2).
Hypervolemia strategy as part of a care pathway for patients with admitting diagnosis of congestive heart failure
This profile defines how to represent jugular venous pressure observations in FHIR using a CHF code and UCUM units of measure (in cmH2O).

name.value: CHF Jugular Venous Pressure Activity Defintion

description.value: Request to measure jugular venous pressure as part of a congestive heart failure pathway
Activity definition to administer LASIX IV as part of a congestive heart failure pathway
Documents the administration of LASIX IV as a pathway event within a congestive heart failure pathway
Request to administer LASIX IV as part of a congestive heart failure pathway
Activity definition to administer LASIX PO as part of a congestive heart failure pathway
Documents the administration of LASIX PO as a pathway event within a congestive heart failure pathway
Request to administer LASIX PO as part of a congestive heart failure pathway
Administer LASIX IV, transition to PO as appropriate
This profile defines how to represent net intake/output observations in FHIR using a CHF code and UCUM units of measure (in L/day).
This profile defines how to represent oxygen saturation observations in FHIR using a standard LOINC code and UCUM units of measure.
Request to measure oxygen saturation as part of a congestive heart failure pathway
This profile defines how to represent potassium observations in FHIR using a standard LOINC code and UCUM units of measure (in meq/L).

name.value: CHF Report Body Weight Activity Defintion
CHF Report Body Weight Change Activity Defintion
CHF Report Urine Out Activity Defintion

description.value: This profile defines how to represent urine output observations in FHIR using a LOINC code and UCUM units of measure (in L/day).
Urine output metric as a feature of a congestive heart failure pathway
Definition of the case plan summary document for a congestive heart failure pathway
Definition of the case summary document for a congestive heart failure pathway
Treatment and management care pathway for patients with admitting diagnosis of congestive heart failure

name.value: Congestive Heart Failure Case/Plan Progressing Note

description.value: Logic for an example congestive heart failure pathway
